snippet: The killing in Nice came at a time of political flux and gives populist movements and the far right new opportunities to press their case....
abstract: News Analysis; terror attack in Nice, France, fuels anti-immigrant movement gripping European countries, whose open border policies have allowed thousands of Middle Eastern migrants to enter unchecked.

byline.original: By ALISON SMALE and STEPHEN CASTLE
byline.contributor: Alison Smale reported from Berlin, and Stephen Castle from London. Joanna Berendt contributed reporting from Warsaw.

lead_paragraph: The killing in Nice came at a time of political flux and gives populist movements and the far right new opportunities to press their case.

headline.main: Attack in France Fuels Anti-Immigrant Parties on Europe’s Right
headline.print_headline: Attack Builds Political Power of Anti-Immigrant Movements in Europe

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
